segments.text: I'm feeling a knot of anxiety watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is just going to cause so much water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to see the woman so utterly oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not notice a puddle growing under their own feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children! That stool is wobbling like it's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could fall and seriously hurt themselves on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to yell at them to stop, to look around!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken dishes and potential injuries makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s an absolute mess of negligence and risk-taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This really grinds my gears, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside only highlights the impending chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe what I'm witnessing here.
segments.speaker: PAR
